^: What is love? Baby don't hurt me, don't hurt me, no more! WHAT IS LOVE!?

a7: This is the official demo of     Polcompistan High: Love Story!
If you spot any glitches or have any recommendations,
please let us know in the        Polcompistan discord server.
(: Oh man, that was one weird dream.What time is it?
OH SHIT! I'm late for school!    Fuuuuuck!
[MOSS runs downstairs to find a  cold breakfast.]
[Attached is a note reading “Havefun at school today! -Mom”]
Damn it! Ugh, I don't have time  to heat this up and eat. I'll    just settle with toast.
[MOSS grabs a slice of bread and puts it in the toaster.]
I heard we're gonna be doing a   project in Science class soon. I wonder what that's all about...?
I'll know when I get there.      Junior year's painful enough as  it is--
Why do they gotta pile up even   more work on us?
[The toaster dings. MOSS pulls   out his breakfast.]
This is gonna be one hell of a   day, I already know THAT much.
[MOSS leaves the house, and bikesto school.]
Fucking nerd. The fuck are you   gonna do, cry? Get the fuck outtahere.
Aw, man, you made me miss class! Catch ya later, loser.
Yeah… that guy’s just… whatever. I-I should probably head to classnow. You should, too.
Wait, are you in Science right   now?
Yeah, I thought I'd recognized   you from somewhere.
Well, it was n-nice talking to   you!
Nice talking to you too. Anyway, I gotta go now. The Teacher's    gonna kick my ass.
Oh, glad you two could finally   join us.
And MECH, didn’t you go to the   bathroom 10 minutes ago?
Sorry ma’am, I overslept. It     won’t happen again.
As I was saying, we will be      holding the annual science fair.
Your projects are DUE on the     27th, and we’ll hold the fair on the 1st.
This will be a group effort. I   will decide your groups, but you can pick your own topic.
{: Alright. For group 5, let’s have…how about ERWIN, MECH,           BREAD EATER, MITSUU, and…
I need to know your topic by the end of class. Decide your group  roles and work schedule, too.
Ugh!! Why do I have to be with   all of YOU?
The teacher assigned us randomly.And besides, it’s not like WE    wanna be with you, either.
…Can we go around the circle and introduce ourselves? I haven’t   even seen half of you guys.
H-Hey everyone…! I’m MECH, as youmay-- uh-- already know, hehe.   I’m transgender, male to female--
Anyway~ I really like poetry. I  have a whole notebook full of    stuff I’ve written…
I’m MITSUU, and I enjoy the      culinary arts. I usually make a  lot of meals at home,
and I take a keen interest in    Japanese cuisine.
…I think ERWIN should introduce  himself now.
HEY, I’m my own person, alright? I’ll do whatever I want.
So I’m ERWIN, and I’m really intoflowers. I actually have a gardenin my backyard~
What? I can’t like flowers       because they look pretty!?
That’s like saying you can’t likewater because it keeps you       hydrated!!
Yeah, but you looked at me       weird!! Just stop doing that if  you don’t have anything to say!!
Well, my name’s MOSS, and I’m    into History.
I could spend, like, days talkingabout World War One.
I have a ton of books on the     battles, the countries that      participated,
the economy during the time, the brutal war crimes com--
Maybe you could teach me about   it, like in study hall or        something--
Oh, so KILLING is cool but       FLOWERS aren’t? You’re a bunch ofpsychopaths--
Hey, can you knock it off?
What about you… what’s your name…bread eater?
I'm pretty sure all he says is   bruh.
So, what kinda roles are we gonnahave? I’m obviously the leader.
Why the fuck are you the leader?
Because I want to be. Why does itmatter? You wanna be the leader?
No, I just wanted to question    you.
Let’s not make this conversation worse than it already is. Let's  just let MITSUU be the leader.
So… What’s our project gonna be  about?
Well, we could do something with chemistry.
Yeah, that sounds like a good    idea. We should talk about       nuclear reactivity.
What? No!! We should make        something pretty, like crystals.
Are you 5 years old? Maybe we    should study your neurology,
so we can find out why you       thought that was a good idea.
Okay, first off, a weeaboo is    defined as someone who’s obsessedwith Japanese culture--
Yeah, that’s you. You just said--
I only said I liked Japanese     cuisine. That doesn’t mean I     have, like,
I bet you fucking do! You        probably have a Hatsune Miku     cover, pervert!
Will you stop being a little     brat? You’re gonna make this a   terrible experience.
That was the bell. I still don’t have a project topic from        MITSUU’s group.
We wouldn’t have wasted so much  time arguing if it weren’t for   MITSUU.
I-I know it was just a joke, but we could do something on         neurology.
Well, we better figure out what  that’ll be quick. I don't wanna  miss next period.
It better be something pretty,   though.
What does that even mean? What   could possibly be “pretty” about a brain?
Y’know, a lot of people think    love is a beautiful aspect of thehuman mind.
U-um… How are we gonna research  that? Do any of us even have a   romantic partner?
I’m sure there’s some research   papers on chemical attraction    between people.
Even then, it’s not like we      couldn’t…
Huh? --Nothing. I think you’re   right, though. That would be an  interesting topic to research.
I guarantee nobody else will do  it.
Will you stop being a dick!?
Fine, we’ll do your stupid love  project. But not because I want  to.
Whatever. It's a majority vote atthis point anyway.
I’ll go tell the teacher what ourtopic is. You should all get     going.
|: [It's after school, and MOSS is  biking home after this peculiar  day.]
What the hell was science class?
I kinda regret agreeing to make  our topic about love, but it was a last minute decision.
Our group is mismatched, it’ll   probably be fun to see how this  unravels.
}: -Huh? Oh, h-hi MOSS... How are   you?
I’ve heard a lot about you,
but I’ve never really taken time out of my day to talk with you   one-on-one.
You’re in a literature club, is  that right?
Oh, yeah~! It’s me and these 3   other girls.
One’s really short and mean,     kinda like ERWIN.
One’s really shy, l-like me I    guess, haha~
Well, she’s a lot like MITSUU,   we’ll leave it at that.
Huh. What does it take to join?
Oh, if you want in, y-you can    just walk up to Room 108 after   school.
The short one baked these super  cute cupcakes for us to eat latertoday.
[MOSS notices a notebook with a  pen in-between the pages.]
I was j-just… writing something  to this guy.
Well… I don’t know if you know   him. His name is POPE PIUS.
Nah, I don’t know him. Do you    like him?
I can try to help you get with   him some time… if you’d like?
~: [MOSS is doing homework in his   bedroom, thinking to himself.]
All this talk about love has got me wondering:
Do I wanna be in love with       someone?
Would anyone even wanna be in a  relationship with me?
I can’t say I haven’t thought    about being with, say, MITSUU    before,
let alone any of the others in   the group.
They all have their own quirks.
Who knows? Maybe they feel the   same way;
it just seems like I’ll never getthe chance to be with any of     them.
[Little does MOSS know what was  about to unfold the next day…]
ab: So, I did some research last     night,
and found out that thinking of   love increases creativity and    concrete thinking--
Looks like some sort of gross    fantasy love letter.
[MECH shoots a rather panicked   glance at MOSS.]
[It's after school, and MOSS is  walking home.]
He, or well-- she, was kind of   endearing.
Timid as a mouse, and confident  as a kitten, she’s the only one  you could even consider normal.
Well, as close to normal as      someone like her could get.
Yeah, looks like a love letter tome.
Oh, who’s your lOvEr? You gonna  get a room with them?
You know they’re gonna be creepedout by that shit.
Everyone, stop. Let’s get back tothe science project.
Kay, but that doesn’t mean MECH  isn’t weird.
Eh, that just looks like English homework.
Oh-- Y-yeah! We have to write a  poem in literature class. That’s what it is! A poem!
You’re gonna look stupid if you  have to present it in front of   the class, you know.
ERWIN, mind your business. Let’s focus on the science project.
ac: What do you think I’m doing,     dumbass? I’m eating lunch.
I meant like, as a courtesy. Justmaking conversation, y’know.
So… What do you think of the     science project?
but it’s cool to get the chance  to hang out with people I don’t  normally talk to, I guess...
I feel that. Weird topic though, right?
I mean, it could be interesting. I’ve always had a soft spot for, like, love, and stuff like that.
Not like I’m-- like soft-- or    anything--
ad: I did some research in study     hall,
and it turns out that holding    your partner’s hand relieves painand stress.
That’s, just, yuck. Who would    wanna lock their grimey little   paws together?
Y’know, ERWIN, I haven’t seen youput any effort into our project  thus far.
Idiot! I HAVE put in effort, you just didn’t see the group        document.
You sure about that? Because     right here it looks like…
Oh, you actually did do somethingafter all.
How about you actually LOOK next time before accusing people?
Well I’m sorry you didn’t do any work until, what, last period?
You really are a snob, aren’t    you? You have a massive ego.
Just because you think I’m lazy  and stupid doesn’t mean--
Will you two shut up already? It was an accident, let it go.
Of course!! You could argue      forever with anyone else,
yet when MOSS says something you get down on your knees and obey  his every command.
Won’t you just let it go now? We should be focusing on the projectanyway.
What? Who said anything about    that?
I did. Besides, he’d  be with me before YOU anyway--
SHUT UP! I didn’t say anything! Iwas talking about a-another MOSS.
Who else in this school would    even have the name “MOSS” anyway?
DUMBASS! There’s someone in my   home ec class named MOSSYNUKES.
I meant him. W-way better than   MOSS, anyway.
I’M THIS CLOSE TO CLOCKING YOU INTHE FACE.
[It's after school, and MOSS is  walking home.]
What crawled up his ass? He gets so offended over everything.
A fresh taste of honesty, sure,  but he’s not really kind about   it.
ae: Oh hey, what’s up bread eater?
Oh right, I forgot that’s all yousay.
I don’t just say bruh, you know. Do you really presume I’m just a comic relief character?
It’s quite alright. I do say bruha lot, though.
It’s just, I didn’t really expectyou to--
Yes, I know, you didn’t think I  could actually articulate        complete sentences.
I get it, you don’t have to worryabout insulting me.
Well, in that case, you mind if Iask what that microphone is all  about?
…I mean, that doesn’t really     narrow anything down, but okay.
Don’t ask questions you’re not   ready to handle the answer to.
Jeez, alright. I’ll see you laterthen, I guess.
af: More research. Found an          interesting fact--
Some animals maintain            relationships with one partner   for the rest of their lives.
For the life of me, PLEASE, just use people talk for once!!
Got something useful to add to   the conversation there?
What does “bruh” mean, anyway?   Are you trying to call us your   brothers,
or are you trying to emphasize   what’s being talked about?
I don’t know, but it sounds      stupid as hell.
W-well, I think it sounds… kinda cute~
I-- I think I just threw up in mymouth a little.
Well, w-what can I say? bruh,    teehee~
Who on God’s green earth         convinced you to say THAT word   and nothing else?
This is hurting my head, can we  just get back to the project?
I actually agree with MITSUU for once.
[It's after school, and MOSS is  walking home.]
An odd name, compared to the restof the group.
Any time you try to question the guy, he doesn’t give a clear     answer.
ag: Nothing right now. Just thinking about what we could research for this project.
So… I think I’ve seen an article about you in the school news.
Something about having the       highest grades?
Oh, that? It’s true, you know.
Unlike all of the other lazy     students,
I actually put a minimal amount  of effort into my assignments.
It’s not without recognition, as you’ve seen.
Hey, you seem pretty competent.  What’s the deal with the other   group members?
Where do I even start? MECH is   just, well, you know how she is. She’s just so sheepish sometimes.
Well, she’s just so shy. Makes ithard to like her.
He’ll just snap randomly wheneveryou question the slightest thing about him.
I guess... What about bread      eater?
What about him? All he says is   "bruh".
I think he’s a little fucked-up  in the head. Don’t tell him I    said that, though.
Y’know, out of everyone in our   group, you’re the only cool one.
H-hah-- thanks man. Well, I’ll   see you soon, alright?
ah: It only takes as little as 4     minutes to decide whether you    like someone or not.
Aww, that’s cute~! That makes me wonder if anyone I’ve talked to  has-- y-y’know, a crush on me…
Ew EW EW!! Don’t say that.
Because it would be gross if     someone had a crush on ME and youjust made me think about it.
WHO would have a crush on YOU!?
YOU could have a crush on me for all I know, bickering back and   forth with me so much.
Hey, maybe I’m NOT opposed to    dating you. I wouldn’t be in it  for the romance, though.
I’d do it because you might gain a few IQ points by talking to me more.
You’d like that, wouldn’t you    bread eater? I bet you’re just ascreepy as MITSUU is.
You’d probably be watching him   and I make out from behind a bushor something.
This is-- uh-- getting really    weird.
…and? What do YOU care? It’s not MY fault if MITSUU has googly-   eyes for me.
It was a JOKE, you putz.
YEAH. RIGHT. You’re a filthy weebso you’re probably crazy for me. What am I to you? A “toondere”?
WEEB ALERT!! WEEB!! ALERT!!      EVERYONE WATCH OUT FOR THE       NECKBEARD!!
Ooooh, MITSUU, I would be a      “Dandere”, right~?
You guys okay? Like, okay as in, mentally stable??
I’m perfectly fine. It’s them    that’re insane.
H-hey~! I’m not insane… A-am I?
If anything, MITSUU’s the crazy  one.
What is all the ruckus back here?I’m THIS close to sending you allto detention.
W-were we too loud? I’m so sorry…
I don’t want to hear another wordout of you 5 for the rest of the class.
You need to be working on your   project silently.
Excuse me, ma’am, but we WERE    working on our project.
We were discussing a fact about  attraction. So sorry if it was   getting too loud, though.
We were arguing over how to applyit to our presentation.
Er… Y-yeah! We were talking      about-- um--
How long it takes for a human to figure out if they have a crush  on someone or not.
Well, keep it down. The other    students are trying to work on   their projects, too.
…Wow. You uh, really covered our asses there.
What can I say? I’m a very       persuasive talker~
Hey, I helped too!! I could’ve   just spilled the beans and made  MITSUU look like a clown.
Yeah. Doesn’t mean you’re not a  weeb, though.
[It's after school, and MOSS is  walking home.]
He's kinda cute, but there's     something... weird about him.
He persuaded the Teacher so      easily and she didn’t even doubt him for a second.
Gives me a bad feeling in my gut,especially since he’s so nice to me compared to the others.
aj: NO!! Why do I gotta research withMECH!?
Because the diagram says so,     ERWIN.
We’ve hit a roadblock. The       written part of our project is   almost done,
but the rubric requires us to do some live research on our topic  if we want the best grade.
EXACTLY!! BEST grade. We don’t   NEED to research with each other.
Yeah, but it’s worth like 25%,   and I don’t want a shitty score.
Right. Well, last evening I was  pondering how we could research,
and I decided to make a diagram  that measured all of our         personality traits.
It allowed us to see who would bemost compatible with who.
And, you needed that to see who  should do research together?
Precisely. We wouldn’t want to   research with someone we’re      incompatible with.
MITSUU won’t show it to us,      though!
Yeah, because I memorized all of the data.
[ERWIN snatches the paper from   out of MITSUU’s binder.]
…I’m AGGRESSIVE!? MITSUU’s the   one who starts everything!
I m-mean, it does seem awfully   biased for-- uh--
MITSUU to have been the only one who made the diagram…
So you want the diagram redone   then, is what you’re saying?
Well, if we all work on it       together,
there’s just gonna be a huge     argument on who should have what traits.
Hey!! I only argue when someone'sbeing DUMB.
I’m sure as hell not letting you do it. You’re too biased.
Hmmph. Not as biased as you.
Hmmm… What if we let MOSS redraw the diagram?
Well, MOSS is probably the most  neutral person in our group.
What’s that? I bet you don’t evenKNOW how to write.
I agree with MITSUU. L-let MOSS  do it!
Well, w-we talked a little bit   ago outside of science class     about--
MOSS talked to you outside of    science class?
Hey, he talked to ME, too!
Yeah, I kinda went around the    school and talked to all of you  this week.
Well, maybe we should let MOSS doit, then. He knows all of us     better than anyone else here.
Ugh! Fiiine. But only because he was nice to me.
MOSS, will you redraw the diagramfor us~?
Both MECH and ERWIN are most     compatible with MOSS?
That’s what it says. It’s a tie, too-- you’re both just as        compatible with him.
You sure you didn’t just make    that up?
When I checked, you should’ve    been most compatible with me--
So you DO have googly-eyes for   him then??
What? U-uh, of course not! It’s  just what I got when I plugged   everything in.
Maybe I made a mistake somewhere…
ASTOUNDING. MITSUU-- Grand       Commander, Genius, Emperor of    Japan, made a MISTAKE!?
Hey, I’m not afraid to admit whenI’m wrong. I just barely make anymistakes.
See? bread eater agrees with me.
So, if MOSS and I are the most   compatible, doesn’t that mean we should research together~?
Hold it! I’m just as compatible  with MOSS as YOU are!!
Well, MOSS, I suppose you have a choice here.
U-um-- yeah. Looks like I do.
Right. I think I should go with  MECH.
R-really?? You w-wanna do it     w-with me~?
You heard ‘em. Guess I’ll        research with ERWIN and bread    eater, then.
We can probably find something   this afternoon to do.
Great. Now I have to suffer      through MITSUU’s presence OUTSIDEof school, too??
Don’t worry, you’ll grow to love me.
MOSS. WHY DIDN’T YOU PICK ME.
Back on subject. MECH, I need youand MOSS to find something to    report on.
I want it by the start of scienceclass tomorrow. Capiche?
I know a few couples in next     period-- I could query them abouttheir relationships.
Remember when we talked in the   library,
a-and you said you would help me get with that guy I like         sometime?
W-well, this is the perfect      opportunity!
If you could help me impress     POPE, we can write down what     happened and present it!
So, what time do you wanna get   together after school for this?
Well, I know that POPE stays     pretty late after class this day of the week,
because he’s in a politics club.
I don’t have any plans, so yeah, that’s cool.
G-GREAT!! I can’t w-wait to see  y-you then!!
(She’s starting to stammer even  more than usual…)
Right. I think I should go with  ERWIN.
Egh. Guess I’ll research with    MECH and bread eater, then.
We’ll find something this        afternoon to do…
ERWIN, go find something to do   with MOSS.
(ERWIN’S response was pretty     enthusiastic, especially for the way MITSUU just said that.)
Well, let’s get going. Like I    said, I want that data TOMORROW. Capiche?
Well-- uhm-- t-this is pretty    weird, right? YOU-- and I--      like-- researching together??
I mean, we’re just doing what    MITSUU told us--
Y-YEAH but that doesn’t mean we  HAVE to do it!!
Sure it is. What do you want to  report on, though?
Hmmmph. WELL, we COULD, er, go tothe mall, and find something     there… or whatever.
Well, as long as you have a good idea in mind.
I don’t have anything planned    today, so, yeah, that’s fine by  me.
ak: [Some time after school, MOSS    bikes to MECH’s house.]
[MECH is sitting on the porch,   waiting for him.]
A-AH~! Hiya, MOSS. You scared me…
Mhmm. Yeah~ I was thinking we    could maybe… Go inside my house  for a little bit.
There’s some stuff we need to do before we go down to the school.
H-huh? Oh, no. T-they’re going   out to eat tonight.
Well, every once in a while they go on a “date” night.
They leave me behind and, uh… Go celebrate their commitment to    each other.
(Huh. That’s actually pretty     sweet of them.)
Anyway, l-let’s go to my room.
U-uh, yeah… Do you like it?
So, what did we need to come in  here for?
Right. Well, I wanna… Y’know,    impress POPE. B-but, I don’t     really know what to say…
It’s not that hard. Here, I’ll   walk you through it.
Pretend you’re POPE, and I’m you.You’re walking out of the school,and I’m coming up to you.
“Oh, hey there, POPE! Didn’t see ya.”
H-hello, MECH. What a-are you    doing here?
“I forgot a notebook in the      library so I came here to get it back.
Say, POPE, There’s something I’vebeen meaning to ask you.”
I also need your opinion on…     s-something else.
Ah. Well, what did you have in   mind for the occasion?
I’ve got 3 different things I    could wear.
H-here, I’ll try on each one so  you can tell me what you think.
Hehe~! Yeah, I thought it’d look cute on me!
So, which one do you think I     should wear?
You doing okay? We don’t have to do this if you don’t want to.
…Thanks for all your help, MOSS. I wouldn’t know what to do       without it.
And… It’s nice to feel cared     about by someone other than my   parents every once in a while.
These past few months have been  hard for me, y’know?
Ever since my transition began,  everyone’s been so judgmental of the way I look, the way I speak.
[MECH stares at MOSS for a       moment.]
It’s really nice to hear that,   haha…
--But, hey, once you get hitched with POPE, you’ll have someone   else who cares for you, right?
Well, what’s the holdup? Let’s gomeet POPE!
I got it! So, I just need to ask him out to eat somewhere?
Yeah, you understand! Sometimes, all you gotta do is ask.
Food is a good way of bonding    with someone else.
I got it! So, should I ask him towatch a movie with me?
Yep! Sometimes, all you gotta do is ask.
And that way, you could sit rightnext to him in the theater.
Just go with it, trust me on     this.
You’re the one who wanted me to  help you get with this guy,      right?
Yeah, it’ll look good when you’representing yourself to POPE.
Yeah, it’ll look good when you’representing yourself to POPE.
Yeah, it’ll look good when you’representing yourself to POPE.
al: [POPE can be heard leaving the   school.]
Just walk up to the entrance, andpretend like you meant to go     inside.
…? What? I don’t have time right now.
I j-just forgot my notebook… I-inthe library.
I… didn’t ask, nor do I care?
Why are you wasting my time? Justspit it out already!
YOU actually thought I’d go so   low as to DATE YOU??
HA! Look at yourself! You’re a   clown!!
I’m in the Politics club. I can  get ANYONE I WANT.
Go back to the garbage bin you   came from, FREAK.
He-- he was just a dick. That’s  all.
It’s gonna be okay… It’s… gonna  be alright…
You know what? I think he’s      WRONG.
You’re NOT a freak. You’re nice, and cute, and positive.
…I… I think I love you, MOSS.
W-what you did just now… Was     just-- so nice.
Y-you saw me crying, and you     rushed over to comfort me…
You always talk so nice to me at school.
You helped me get ready for POPE.
Y-you… I really think you’re     perfect too, MOSS.
I love you. I… wish I could be   with you.
[MECH touches foreheads with     MOSS. She starts smiling.]
Do you, maybe wanna come back to my house tonight?
[MOSS and MECH head back to      MECH’s house.]
[MECH grabs MOSS’s hand as they  walk.]

W-what you did just now… Was     just-- so nice.
Y-you saw me crying, and you     rushed over to comfort me…
You always talk so nice to me at school.
You helped me get ready for POPE.
Y-you… I really think you’re     perfect too, MOSS.
I love you. I… wish I could be   with you.
[MECH touches foreheads with     MOSS. She starts smiling.]
Do you, maybe wanna come back to my house tonight?
[MOSS and MECH head back to      MECH’s house.]
[MECH grabs MOSS’s hand as they  walk.]
ao: Yeah! It’s because, well, me and MOSS…
Yep. We, uh, hung out yesterday,
and one thing after another, we  found out we have feelings for   each other.
Well. Congrats on that. MOSS. andMECH.
What’s up with you now, ERWIN?
Aww, “bruh” to you too, bread    eater~!
You seem awfully affectionate    today, MECH.
W-well, I just think bread       eater’s so lovable~
O-oh, sorry, MOSS! Maybe I       shouldn’t have said that in frontof you…
(I mean, she shouldn’t have said it to begin with.)
So, you got the data we need for the project or what?
[MOSS pulls a document out of hisbinder.]
Well, along with the stuff ERWIN and I wrote down, we’ve got      everything we need.
[MITSUU looks down at the paper  one more time. His eyes widen.]
MOSS. There’s something on this  paper I’m gonna need to talk to  you about later.
W-well, should I come along too?
It’s something he clearly did    that I need to correct him on,   personally.
Oh, by the way, did you hear     about what happened to POPE last night?
He said he saw this ugly chick   come up to him when he was on hisway out.
It was in the way of, and I      quote, “his grindset”.
Let’s not talk about that,       MITSUU.
Why? Certainly it was just some  random girl. Unless you’re not   telling me something…
No, no, it’s just that we need tofocus on importing the data into our presentation.
POPE’s a dick, you know that?
He’s just… So damn mean. It makesme wanna beat his ASS!
(That wasn’t very… rebellious of ERWIN to say.)
[The gang works on the           presentation for the rest of the period. MECH sits next to MOSS.]
ap: [As the bell rings, MOSS walks   out to the courtyard.]
So, you said you wanted to talk  to me about something?
Yes, MOSS. Come with me for a    second.
Just, come on. There’s too many  people around us.
[MITSUU and MOSS walk over to a  nearby tree.]
What’s so secret that you had to take me over here to tell me?
I know that you tried to get MECHwith POPE.
I’m in the Politics club with    him.
We have a group chat on Discord, and he told me everything.
Don’t you think it’s a little    insensitive to bring it up right in front of MECH?
Hey, I’m a direct person, MOSS.
I’m direct to ERWIN, I’m direct  to MECH, and now I’m being directto you.
(Didn’t he talk shit about       everyone behind their backs      earlier?
What’s the big deal, huh MITSUU??
I’m just trying to WARN you.
I’ve noticed how MECH’s been     looking at bread eater.
You probably have too, you just  refuse to say anything about it.
(He’s right. I have. But, it was just a flirty compliment… So why is it so important?)
Maybe you didn’t read her        correctly. I did, though.
You dating MECH gave her a new   sense of self-confidence.
Unfortunately for you, it seems  she's getting a little daring.
I can tell she has googly eyes   for him.
You’re blowing it out of         proportion.
If there’s anything dating       simulators have taught me about  people,
it’s that there’s always a twist,MOSS. ALWAYS.
Maybe if you paid more attention,you’d see what I mean.
Why would you even tell me this  in the first place??
I would tell anyone if I thought their partner was acting         suspicious.
Besides, I think you deserve     better than MECH.
What do you mean by that!?
I’m just saying. Maybe you       should’ve picked someone else.
Someone that’s as smart as you.  As cool as you. As CLEVER as you.
Oh well now, MOSS. I hope you’re happy with your decision.
aq: [A few days pass. MOSS starts    becoming more and more suspiciousof MECH.]
And then, the teacher looked at  me like I was dead!
You’re such a good listener,     BREADy boy~
I see you’re, uh, chatting up    quite the storm with bread eater.
Yeah, they’ve been like this the entire day. I even saw them walk into the classroom together.
How are they even having a       conversation??
Who knows. They seem to be       getting CLOSER as friends,       though.
…What do we have left for the    project?
Not much, actually. Just some    finishing touches.
Oh, we do need to find out how   we’re gonna set it up in the     library, though.
Oooh! Oooh! I know~! Me and breadeater could walk down there and  find the best spot!
How about YOU and I go do that??
U-uh, yeah! I was just about to  say that, too!
[MOSS and MECH walk down to the  library together.]
So, I noticed you’ve been talkingto bread eater a lot more,       lately.
Isn’t he great~? Maybe you shouldtalk to him more, too.
Hm. What do you guys talk about  in particular?
Um, w-well… Nothing special,     really~ Just small talk.
Huh? Why are you l-looking at me like that, MOSS?
You can compliment someone       without dating them, can’t you??
Why are y-you asking about it?
I-I… I can’t BELIEVE you’d even  THINK that!!
Y’know, it really comes off that way.
MOSS. The reason I’m talking to  bread eater so much,
is because of how you treated me the day we went to go research.
I’m complimenting him and giving him the time of day because      nobody else does.
He’s just like I WAS before you  came around to help me.
You’ve barely even talked to me  since that day. It’s like you    don’t care how I FEEL.
No, I’m not done asking you      questions!
Y-you can’t just avoid the       situation!!
[MOSS goes back to the classroom alone.]
So, did you find a spot for us--
Wow, quite a surge of emotion    from you, just now.
And YOU. You piece of SHIT.
I don’t wanna see your FUCKING   FACE. YOU’RE responsible for     this!!
I’m done. I’m at my limit.
I can’t do this stupid project   anymore. I-I’m grabbing my stuff and leaving.
ar: …Everything’s going by so fast.  My head’s spinning.
When I looked at MECH, I saw her as a liar. Someone who was using me…
…I know who made me feel this    way.
That bastard. The way he pulled  me aside and spoke with me.
He was trying to MANIPULATE me,  not WARN me.
I can see it clear as day now...
And the way MECH was trying to   defend herself.
I was so mean to her, wasn’t I?  I should never have pressured herlike that.
She doesn’t need that in her     life, especially from her        boyfriend.
The way you looked into my eyes  when you said you were leaving…
…I understand what I need to do.
I need to march right down to    MECH’s house and apologize to    her, and give her a big hug.
She’s probably just as upset as Iam.
[MOSS gets out from under the    covers of his bed.]
It’s time to do what’s right.
as: (I know it’s a little late, but  that shouldn’t be an issue,      right?)
[MOSS knocks on the door. It     wasn’t locked, and it creaks     open.]
[MOSS hears something coming fromMECH's room. He decides to       investigate.]
MECH, I feel terrible after what I did, and I just wanted to tell you--
I… I came here to apologize.
For… accusing you of w-wanting tobe with bread eater.
IT’S NOT WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE, I   SWEAR!!
Apparently, I was wrong to even  HOPE I could fix things.
Before I go. I want to tell you  one thing, MECH…
I have feelings for bread eater, too.
It’s… It’s true. I know that he  can actually talk.
He’s just so cute. And charming. I can’t lie about it now.
This is… New-- and rather        surprising information to me,    MOSS.
And now that I see him and my    girlfriend kissing, I think…
...What if we tried to make this work?
Honestly… If we all dated each   other…
Well… BREADy boy, w-what do you  think?
I really do like both of you, so…
So then, it’s official. We’re    polyamourous.
But-- w-what should we tell the  others?
We’ll just be honest. It’s not   like they can do anything to stopus, anyway.
Affirmative. We’ll bring it up onMonday, then.
at: Did… Did I do anything wrong?    Like, really?
Did I step out of line so much   that I deserved this?
Because, when I look back on it, I didn’t.
All of this… It’s been like a    game.
Making different choices, leadingto different outcomes.
But, how different were those    outcomes, really?
It begs the question-- Did my    choices really matter at all?
Or, no matter what I picked…
Heh. Maybe that’s what love is.
As beautiful as it may be, it canalso become toxic.
It’s like, the more you love     someone,
the harder it is to get over themwhen they’re lost…
I remember when I asked myself ifI wanted to be in love with      someone.
Well, the answer is… No, I don’t.
Perhaps I pondered that question so much because I wanted to fill a hole on the inside.
I wanted something to break the  mold of my average, monotonous   life…
But I was looking at love the    wrong way.
Love isn’t something that should be thrown onto others;
You should prepare yourself      before committing to someone.
And that's where MECH went wrong.
I didn’t love MYSELF first and   foremost…
I’m gonna take the love I have   bundled up inside me, and use it for myself.
I wouldn’t have it any other way…
au: However, if this is your first   time,
I should notify you that there’s much more to this game.
You picked MECH this time. Why   not choose to research with      ERWIN?
You chose to reject MECH when youfound out she was cheating; what if you didn’t?
Point is, there’s quite a bit    here.
Even if you don’t continue       playing, I have one more thing tosay.
From me, and everyone on my team:
av: [Today is the day of the science fair.]
[Everyone’s gathered to present  their projects, and only one teamcan win.]
Greetings, students! As you all  know,
we’ve invited the entire school  to come down to the library todayto view your projects.
This is a competition. Let me    educate the rest of your peers onwho you all are.
Our first group is led by...
They have researched Nuclear     Reactivity in fresh-water lakes  near Power Plants.
Our second group is led by...
They have researched Selective   Breeding, and the genetics of    modern crops.
Our third group is led by...
They have researched the MagneticField of Earth.
Our fourth group is led by...
They have researched the Stimuli of Social Media and its effects  on productivity.
And last, but not least, we have our fifth group, led by MITSUU.
They have researched the         Neurology behind Love between    Human Beings.
We will now let all non-         participants wander around for   themselves,
and have a good look at          everyone’s presentations.
We will have a slotted box by thepodium for you all to cast in    your vote for today’s winners.
And for the teams, I wish you allgood luck!
[The audience is now walking     around to view the projects.]
I hope our project does well…
Well, if it doesn’t, then all ourtime and effort went to waste.
I was looking something up and   lost track of time.
MOSS? Well, it’s a surprise to   see you, after storming out on   Friday like that.
MECH, do you wanna say it?
bread eater, MOSS, and I, are    seeing each other now~!
It’s true. We all have feelings  for each other, and we decided toexpress that.
I tried to WARN you, MOSS.
And you were right, MITSUU. MECH DID have googly eyes for bread   eater.
Well, at least ERWIN’s still     alone with nobody to love. It    warms my heart.
STOP IT!! I WANNA be single,     unlike YOU.
--Back to uh, what I was saying  about being late.
I was thinking, if we won, we    could go out to celebrate as a   group.
And where do YOU wanna go so     bad??
I was thinking we could go to    that new ice cream parlor        downtown.
I read the reviews, and it’s all positive so far.
Well, that sounds good to me.
...Fiiiine. I guess we could get ice cream, or whatever.
Y-you know me and BREADy boy are by your side, MOSS~!
We’ve counted all of the votes,  and we’re ready to announce the  winner of this Science Fair.
...MITSUU, MOSS, MECH, bread     eater, and ERWIN!
You have won the school’s award  for “Scientific Research         Excellence”!
You’ll be seeing some extra      credit, and your names on a      plaque.
I-I can’t believe it, MOSS, we   won~!
I can’t tell you how much sleep  I’ve lost over this project.
Thank you all for coming, I’m    sure the teams appreciated it.
You are all dismissed for the    day!
Yes, of course. Lead the way,    MOSS.
[The group is ordering their ice cream of choice.]
The mochi ice cream, if you      would.
Yeah, can I get cookies and      cream??
...and I’d like a slice of the   ice cream cake, thank you.
No no, do that again! Do the     speaking English thing!!
It’s fine, bread eater. Go ahead,talk.
You’re correct, MOSS. I shouldn’tfeel as insecure about my        language skills.
Uh… No, no you shouldn’t. You’re surprisingly eloquent.
It appears our “story” has come  to an end.
And maybe there’s a moral to our,er, “story”.
Love is something that should be shared, not hidden.
Perhaps we spend too much time   judging others for their         wrongdoings,
instead of giving them a second  chance.
Beautifully said, MOSS. I agree ahundred times over.
Only ERWIN, ruining a nice       philosophy with something        idiotic.
We’re not going back to THAT     conversation now, are we?
Why do you think I’m such a      pervert!?
Do you even know what perversion looks like?
Uhh, YEAH. I’m looking at it     right now.
I said it once and I’ll say it   again:
THERE! Is THAT what you wanted!?
Go ahead, call me a pervert one  more time!!
What’s the matter, huh? You’re   blushing, you know.
C-can you guys g-give us a       moment??
Fine. But “nOt BeCaUsE i WaNt    To”...
These past days have surely been full of surprises for all of us.
So… What should we do now…?
Well, if I’m in charge, I supposewe could…
Go back to my house for a while.
I suppose you could say, now thatwe’re all in a relationship,
we’ve opened up a new “story” of our own.
Correct. But first, we should    look back, and watch this one    close.
(Did I really make the right     choice? Is this what I really    wanted…?)
(...Yes, it really is. Look at   us-- everyone’s so happy.
…You alright, MOSS?? You’re so   deep in thought.
W-well, I’m just happy to be withyou~
...I’m happy to be with you too, MECH. I love you.
aw: However, if this is your first   time,
I should notify you that there’s much more to this game.
You picked MECH this time. Why   not choose to research with      ERWIN?
You chose to stay with MECH--    what if you were to reject her?
Point is, there’s quite a bit    here.
Even if you don’t continue       playing, I have one more thing tosay.
From me, and everyone on my team:
Oh yeah and get a life you cuck
ax: [Some time after school, MOSS    arrives at the mall.]
[He walks through the main       entrance, to find ERWIN running  up to him.]
Oh, hey ERWIN. Ready to gather   information for our project?
I’m… just… super… Annoyed that I have to do t-this with YOU.
So, are you gonna tell me why    we’re going to the mall to do    research?
I WILL!! We just… have something to do first.
Wellll, we have to go to the     Clothes Outlet. I wanna buy a    cute new pair of shoes.
What does this have to do with   RESEARCH!?
HEY!! You wanna get our part     done,
or do you wanna deal with pissy  MITSUU the rest of the project?
(Seeing how MITSUU already argueswith ERWIN all the time,
I sure as hell don’t want it to  happen to ME.)
Shoes Ah Ah Yes is my favorite   store! They have so much cool    stuff here~!
Well, take a good look around.
[ERWIN roots around shoes ah ah  yes, and finds some pairs he     likes.]
E-er-- I totally know what shoes I want, but…
Which ones do you think I should get??
(Did ERWIN just take me here so  we could go SHOPPING together!?)
NO!! We have to check out first, dummy~!
[ERWIN and MOSS go to czech out.]
Didn’t you read the price tag?
I-I didn’t expect them to be THATmuch.
[ERWIN hands over his debit card.The transaction is complete.]
Here’s your receipt. Have a      wonderful day!
Jeez, you had that much money to spend on shoes?
Yeah. I’ve been saving up for an occasion like this~
Then let’s go to the Food Court!
How are we gonna research by     eating?
[ERWIN is trying his best to comeup with an excuse.]
We c-can watch people. Eating    there.
we can go to the Food Court and  write down some information aboutcouples dining together?
[MOSS and ERWIN go to the Food   Court.]
So, what do you wanna eat??
...I’m just trying to think of a conversation piece.
It’s fine, take your time. I     won’t bite.
But-- uh-- yeah, thanks for beingnice.
OH? You DO!? W-well, I HATE them.They’re, uh…
You know you can tell me the     truth, ERWIN.
I’m not gonna argue with you likeMITSUU.
I’M GONNA CLOCK YOU IN THE FACE.
--Have you seen the new one with Leonard VonMacrio?
No, I haven’t. What’s it called? Moonlit Lovers, or something likethat?
Yeah. Y’know, I’d love to go see that with someone.
Unless… You’d pay for my ticket~?
What!? Why would I do that??
You literally just bought a $300 pair of shoes, I know you can    afford it.
…Speaking of “cute” people,      w-what do you think of MECH?
OH, she IS now, IS SHE??
A bit too shy for my liking,     truthfully.
Oh… Yeah, no, you’re right, I    think.
...So, is that why you chose M-MEover her??
Yeah… I just like you better, I  suppose.
You’re a pervert, you know that!?
Picking who you want to research with based on who you like more??
I don’t think you’re that opposedto the idea, really.)
...Anyway, there’s something I   wanted to tell you, MOSS.
All of the people in our group atschool…
B-but, I guess you don’t suck AS much…
Are you trying to compliment me?
DUM DUM!! You STILL suck ass!    Just less!!
And… If I were given the choice  to choose you or MECH…
Well, thank you ERWIN. That was  pretty nice of you.
There’s something I wanted to    tell you, too…
Here, let me come in a little    closer and I'll say.
[MOSS gets out of his chair.     ERWIN does the same.]
W-why do you need me to get      closer to you?
Well, it’s kinda secret, I don’t want anyone else to hear.
C-can’t you just tell me later??
[MOSS puts his hand on ERWIN's   arm.]
I HAVE A HUGE CRUSH ON YOU,      OKAY!? IS THAT WHAT YOU WANTED TOHEAR???
I WANNA LOOK PRETTY FOR YOU.     THAT’S WHY WE WENT SHOE          SHOPPING--
I WANNA GO OUT TO EAT WITH YOU.  THAT’S WHY WE’RE IN THE FOOD     COURT--
YOU’RE SO HANDSOME!! I WANNA GO  OUT WITH YOU AND KISS YOU AND--
There’s just something so cute   about the way you talk and the   way you present yourself.
I guess what I’m trying to say   is…
And I’d be more than glad to takethings further with you.
…You… Wanna go see that movie we were talking about??
B-but you still have to pay for  my ticket!! I wasn’t lying about that~!
[ERWIN and MOSS start heading outof the mall.
For once, ERWIN actually seems tobe happy.]
Those platform boots are kinda   cool.
Grr! I’m gonna have to buy so    much more black and blue emo     stuff to go with them now!!
The kitty heels could be cute.
Yeah, I think so! The name’s     cute, too. “Kitty”~
(Note to self, NEVER buy         something because of the name.)
Yeah, that's a good choice… I    don’t have any shoes for warm    weather anyway.
The color’s pretty, too. It      reminds me of an anemone flower~
Is that what you’re wearing in   your hair?
H-huh? Oh, yeah. Anemones are my favorite~!
Eww, BURGER BELL?? What a grease-fest.
Hey, it’s fast food. What can youdo?
What are you, a filthy weeb like MITSUU??
(Honestly, I thought you’d say   it’s too greasy...)
ay: Hello, MOSS. Have you and ERWIN  gathered the data I asked for?
Well, me and ERWIN were          researching together, and one    thing after another…
We, uh, decided to take things tothe next level~
Aww, I’m so proud of you two~
[Huh. That’s a better reaction   out of MITSUU than I expected.]
I haven’t seen him all da--
What’s wrong? You look really    pissed.
Hmmph. Sounds like ERWIN’s had a rough night.
We should have everything we neednow, all that’s left is to importit into our presentation.
May I see your research paper?
[MOSS gives MITSUU the paper fromout of his binder.]
MOSS. There’s something on this  paper I’m gonna need to talk to  you about later.
Last night, when me, MITSUU and  bread eater went to research,
they helped me try to impress    that guy I was telling you about.
We dressed her up and gave her   advice,
but as soon as she approached    POPE, he acted like he was too   good for her.
Sounds like a real dickweed to   me.
Y’know, he used to be a cool guy,until he got into that Politics  club.
Then, he started becoming really arrogant.
I stopped talking to him after   that.
Honestly, I’m thankful MECH      didn’t end up with him. They     don’t fit as a couple anyway.
Hey, I know a bad couple when I  see it.
And I’m not afraid to step in    about it, either.
[The gang works on the           presentation for the rest of the period.
ERWIN spaces himself from MOSS   and MITSUU.]
az: [As the bell rings, MOSS walks   out to the courtyard.]
So, you said you wanted to talk  to me about something?
Yes, MOSS. Come with me for a    second.
Just, come on. There’s too many  people around us.
[MITSUU and MOSS walk over to a  nearby tree.]
MOSS, MOSS, MOSS… You know, I’ve always found that name to be     cute.
And I think it suits you         perfectly well~
Ugh, why are we talking here     right now? You’re beating around the bush.
I’ll answer your question, if youanswer mine, MOSS.
You know about ERWIN’s past,     right?
Well, I’ve known ERWIN for a longtime now, MOSS.
And I’ll tell you, every time    that boy gets in a relationship,
he finds a way to RUIN it.
Haven’t you noticed how RUDE he  is?
Haven’t you noticed how stubborn he is?
That information combined with   the fact that he’s clingy,
well… It doesn’t look good for   you.
I… I don’t care, MITSUU. What himand I have is different.
I can find good in him,          apparently unlike YOU.
And given the circumstances, thatquality of me is shining bright.
You know, ERWIN used to be with  MECH before she transitioned.
That sounds like a lie. ERWIN    doesn’t act like it.
Well, remember what I said about him ruining his relationships?
After the “incident”, he plays itoff like the two of them never   met.
The two of them were together fora while, you know.
But one day, they got into an    argument.
And ERWIN, fueled with rage,     knocked MECH out with a blow to  the head.
She was rushed to the ER, and    apparently she suffered a        concussion.
There’s no way that’s true,      MITSUU!
Otherwise, what business would I have telling you their secret?
(How come you know about this,   but nobody else does?)
The point I’m getting at is that ERWIN isn’t fit for you, or      anyone else.
…Perhaps you should’ve picked    someone different, MOSS.
A-are you saying you have a crushon me??
If you’re interested, you can    always find out~
There’s a really good sushi placedowntown, MOSS.
It’s too bad I always go there bymyself...
I’d looove to go there again witha cute boy such as yourself~
If what you’re saying is true,   then I guess…
I don’t really have a reason to  decline your offer~
I knew you’d come around         eventually~
…I need to talk to ERWIN about   this.
Now hold on a second, MOSS.
I’m giving you a way out.
You’re really gonna take that andshove it back in my face?
I already told you EVERYTHING,   MOSS.
If you think of me so lowly, thatyou can’t trust the words coming out of my mouth,
then yeah, maybe you SHOULD run  back to your little psycho.
I forgive you, really, I do.
I’ll see you at the science fair~
aA: I’m really glad you came here    with me today, MOSS~
…Yeah. It’s just, I don’t wanna  make a decision I’ll regret.
Don’t worry, you’ll be safe with me, I promise.
So, what are you gonna get?
I’m going to get the salmon      temari. This is a happy occasion,isn’t it?
I think I’ll go with the… uh… is that crab with a “k”?
You’re going with krab? Not tuna?Salmon? Eel?
Sure. It just sounds good to me  right now, is all.
[The waitress walks up to the    table.]
What can I get for you two?
Erm, yes, I’ll have the salmon   temari, and my lovely date here  will have the tuna maki.
Of course, sir. That will be     right out for you, okay?
(That’s not what I wanted at     all!)
Hey, I wanted the krab, not the  tuna! Why didn’t you just tell   her that!?
Well, I thought if I was the one paying, I’d be the one to decide what to order.
(Holy shit! That’s a red flag if I’ve ever seen one. I should get out of here…)
I need to get home. My mom wants me to be there, ASAP.
What for? We’re in the middle of a nice dinner date,
it would be a real shame for you to leave before we even got to   eat.
It’s what, MOSS? Something tells me you’re fibbing.
Looks like she was mistaken--    E-everything’s fine.
I like that jacket of yours~
Oh, this? It’s a part of the Pie Crew vegan leather collection.
I got it half off, and I’ve been wearing it ever since.
Have you seen those new shoes    ERWIN’s been wearing?
Yikes. They look awful on him.
(Little does he know, I was the  one who picked them out…)
[The waitress is back with their order.]
Well MOSS, time to dig in.       Itadakimasu!
Yeah, Ida… hockey… maisou, to    you, MITSUU.
[MOSS and MITSUU eat. When       they’re finished, MITSUU says…]
You know, it’s been so fun going out to eat with you…
--Oh, my, it’s getting dark,     isn’t it?
Well, if that’s the case, I don’twant us to part ways here-- it’s not safe out there all alone.
Maybe we could, y’know, head backto my place for the night~
Look, MITSUU. That sounds great, but I need to go home.
Oh? I can’t imagine your mother  needs you back for an “emergency”again, does she?
Thanks for the food, it tasted   great. See you at the Science    Fair.
[MOSS leaves. He's starting to   regret his decision...]
aB: [Today is the day of the science fair.]
[Everyone’s gathered to present  their projects, and only one teamcan win.]
Greetings, students! As you all  know,
we’ve invited the entire school  to come down to the library todayto view your projects.
This is a competition. Let me    educate the rest of your peers onwho you all are.
Our first group is led by...
They have researched Nuclear     Reactivity in fresh-water lakes  near Power Plants.
Our second group is led by...
They have researched Selective   Breeding, and the genetics of    modern crops.
Our third group is led by...
They have researched the MagneticField of Earth.
Our fourth group is led by...
They have researched the Stimuli of Social Media and its effects  on productivity.
And last, but not least, we have our fifth group, led by MITSUU.
They have researched the         Neurology behind Love between    Human Beings.
We will now let all non-         participants wander around for   themselves,
and have a good look at          everyone’s presentations.
We will have a slotted box by thepodium for you all to cast in    your vote for today’s winners.
And for the teams, I wish you allgood luck!
[The audience is now walking     around to view the projects.]
I thought he’d like to celebrate all our hard work…
I’ve been so worried about you, Ihaven’t seen you since Friday!
Ah, I almost forgot! There’s     something ERWIN would like to    share with you.
You, MITSUU, are a horrible      fucking human being!
You’re always egotistical, you   lie, you blackmail,
and apparently your life is so   awful,
that you have the need to always correct every little thing I do!
And I’ve had enough of it!!
MOSS. The reason I’ve been so    quiet is because I’ve been forcedto.
Forced? What do you mean by that?
I was being MANIPULATED by       MITSUU.
He threatened to get me expelled if I didn’t leave you alone!
He said that he’d tell everyone Igave MECH a concussion!
Wait, so… None of what MITSUU    said to me was true?
OF COURSE he already talked to   you! You’re his primary target,  why wouldn’t he!?
No! I didn’t do any of the shit  he says I did!
ERWIN, might I add that we did   MORE than just talk… We went on aDATE together.
You wanna throw the truth out    there?
When I was talking to MOSS after school, he was given the choice  between YOU or ME.
You know, this really does open  my eyes.
You know what it shows me?
That both of you are TERRIBLE.
I DON’T WANNA SEE EITHER OF YOU, EVER AGAIN!!
I guess it’s just you and me now,huh MOSS~?
YOU MADE ME GIVE UP ERWIN, AND   FOR WHAT!?
Don’t get mad at me, kitten.
Sounded to me like you didn’t    want him anymore.
And you got just that, right? I  delivered on my end.
And I’ll NEVER let go of you~!
It appears your folly has led to a much worse fate than you       anticipated.
Not that it isn’t undeserved, in my opinion.
You didn’t even give ERWIN a     chance to explain himself;
And now, you must deal with an   equally reckless outcome.
aC: However, if this is your first   time,
I should notify you that there’s much more to this game.
You picked ERWIN this time. Why  not choose to research with      MECH?
You chose to go out with MITSUU  this time;
what if you went to check up on  ERWIN your next playthrough?
Point is, there’s quite a bit    here.
Even if you don’t continue       playing, I have one more thing tosay.
From me, and everyone on my team:
aD: [The campus is now empty, except for a few people.]
[MOSS tracks down ERWIN, standingall alone in one of the corners  of the courtyard.]
Yeah, I know. I’ve been meaning  to talk to you, too.
I… Might not be able to see you, anymore.
Look, it’s not that I don’t like you. I really do, but…
I got a DM last night from a     random account, claiming to be   him.
He said that if I don’t leave youalone,
he’d make up a lie about me      hitting MECH and get me expelled for it.
Hold on! Let me get this         straight.
Oh, so he already used it on you,huh?
This is very eye-opening for me, ERWIN. I almost thought you      actually did.
I didn’t even get to know MECH   until we were all assigned       together for the project.
Can I see your message history   with him?
[ERWIN hands his phone over to   MOSS. It's displaying his DMs.]
What the hell do you want??
How do I put this? I only want   one thing from you.
I want to make sure you don’t    make a move on MOSS.
Back off. It’s too late, we’re   already together.
Stay away from MOSS, or I’ll telleveryone you assaulted MECH.
I’ll play it off like you were   dating, and got into an argument.
Go ahead. Run to MOSS and tell   him. I’ll do it.
I’ll get you fucking expelled,   little runt.
That’s what I thought. See you   in class, kek.
[MOSS hands the phone back to    ERWIN.]
Yeah? Well, it’s not really your fault, anyway.
I’ll just keep my mouth shut, as long as you play along.
If I get expelled, it’ll ruin my life.
No. I’m not gonna let you just   sit here and take it.
I’m gonna confront MITSUU at the Science Fair, and expose him.
Then we’ll see who the one in    trouble is.
MOSS. Are you sure about this??
I care about you too much to let a manipulator like MITSUU beat   you around.
Well, if it means anything…      Thanks, MOSS.
aE: [Today is the day of the science fair.]
[Everyone’s gathered to present  their projects, and only one teamcan win.]
Greetings, students! As you all  know,
we’ve invited the entire school  to come down to the library todayto view your projects.
This is a competition. Let me    educate the rest of your peers onwho you all are.
Our first group is led by...
They have researched Nuclear     Reactivity in fresh-water lakes  near Power Plants.
Our second group is led by...
They have researched Selective   Breeding, and the genetics of    modern crops.
Our third group is led by...
They have researched the MagneticField of Earth.
Our fourth group is led by...
They have researched the Stimuli of Social Media and its effects  on productivity.
And last, but not least, we have our fifth group, led by MITSUU.
They have researched the         Neurology behind Love between    Human Beings.
We will now let all non-         participants wander around for   themselves,
and have a good look at          everyone’s presentations.
We will have a slotted box by thepodium for you all to cast in    your vote for today’s winners.
And for the teams, I wish you allgood luck!
[The audience is now walking     around to view the projects.]
I thought he’d like to celebrate all our hard work…
Oh, hello, MOSS. How’s your      relationship with ERWIN holding  up?
Well, that’s actually what I’ve  been meaning to talk to you      about, buddy.
That’s right. I know what you    said, MITSUU.
Your lies are flimsy as shit!
He knows you blackmailed me into leaving him alone!
And based on the fact that you   were gonna get ERWIN expelled if he cracked,
I’d say that it’ll actually be   YOU who gets punished.
…I’ve b-been trying SO hard to   make you notice me, MOSS.
When you turned me down, I-I eventried to stay calm l-like nothinghappened.
And then you ACCUSE me of        BLACKMAILING ERWIN!?
Y-you’re AWFUL, you know that,   MOSS?
I HOPE YOU BOTH ROT IN HELL!!
He was using us as pawns to get  what he wanted.
...Then I’d say that you did the right thing.
W-well, yes, I can speak         English-- And Hebrew, and Latin.
Then why did you just keep saying“bruh” like a dumbass!?
One word can mean a thousand     things.
(I guess so, at least in his     case…)
I’m just glad me and MOSS can be together~!
It’s good MITSUU’s been exposed  for what he is. Here’s to hoping he doesn’t come back.
Oh! Oh! I think the TEACHER’s    gonna say something.
We’ve counted all of the votes,  and we’re ready to announce the  winner of this Science Fair.
...MITSUU, MOSS, MECH, bread     eater, and ERWIN!
You have won the school’s award  for “Scientific Research         Excellence”!
You’ll be seeing some extra      credit, and your names on a      plaque.
I’m so happy we won, I could…
[ERWIN grabs MOSS by the jacket  and kisses him on the lips.]
Thank you all for coming, I’m    sure the teams appreciated it.
You are all dismissed for the    day!
You know, I think I learned a    little something about love.
True love is something that you  need to dig deep to find; and    it’s not an easy task.
Sometimes, you have to stand up  for what you believe in to get   the life you desire.
I think that’s a good way at     looking at things, MOSS. Well    said.
I was thinking we could celebratea little.
Oh, and how are we gonna do that?
Well, I found a really nice city garden for us to go to.
It’s usually hard to get in, but I called today and made an       appointment for us…
aF: However, if this is your first   time,
I should notify you that there’s much more to this game.
You picked ERWIN this time. Why  not choose to research with      MECH?
You chose to deny MITSUU’s offer to go on a date;
Point is, there’s quite a bit    here.
Even if you don’t continue       playing, I have one more thing tosay.
From me, and everyone on my team:
aM: Hey kids, it's your friendly neighborhood felon
Can I be in the game?
Why does gen 8 suck so bad?
